storyInfo: Viviana meets Empress Ewigegnade and learns that her father's murder is related to the Witch King's remnants, who have also stolen a copy of the Güldenesgesatz. She takes on the responsibility of investigating the case as an Empresses' Voice.

attributes.content: Meine Dame, you should rest.
attributes.name: Noble Attendant

attributes.content: Just how many times have you repainted this already? If you're reworking the piece, then why not...
attributes.name: Noble Attendant

attributes.content: Why not have me contact the art gallery and ask them to delay the exhibition?
attributes.name: Noble Attendant

attributes.content: You've been so much more spirited since that musician arrived. But to jump straight back into painting when you've yet to fully recover from your illness, only to work on... this piece...
attributes.name: Noble Attendant

attributes.content: Is this a... night sky? The blacks are so intense I can't make anything out.
attributes.name: Noble Attendant

attributes.content: What a truly unforgettable shade of night. I see your painting will soon be complete.
However, the intense emotions fueling your tireless endeavors are also wearing down your body, and you're in no shape to go on.
So... would you like me to continue my performance?
Alright, I've heard your answer.
As well as your pain, regret, remorse, obsession... In your heart, Leithanien died alongside you that night. The very same night reflected in your painting.
Then allow me to play you a dirge, albeit more than twenty years late.
Leithanien's capital, Zwillingstürme, city center
Listen.
attributes.name: Golden-haired Woman

attributes.content: Every day at this hour, this city is filled with all kinds of music.
attributes.name: Golden-haired Woman

attributes.content: Students stopping by the instrument shops on the way home from school, discussing which of the new instruments has a more stable circuit.
attributes.name: Golden-haired Woman

attributes.content: Pedestrians getting off work, slowing their pace as their coins jingle into a instrument case in front of a street artist.
attributes.name: Golden-haired Woman

attributes.content: Young lovers clinking together glasses of wine in restaurants, and stoves steaming in warm homes.
attributes.name: Golden-haired Woman

attributes.content: Every scene as touching as the last.
attributes.name: Golden-haired Woman

attributes.content: Evenings in Zwillingstürme have always been a source of inspiration for many great musicians.
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: Hmm... Then shall we add a few more pieces to the program for the celebration?
attributes.name: Golden-haired Woman

attributes.content: Every year we begin with the Güldenesgesatz, and then perform the same routine classical pieces after. Surely the people are becoming less and less interested by the year?
attributes.name: Golden-haired Woman

attributes.content: As ever, the program is up to Your Majesties to decide.
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: Then let's have a chat with the conductor and the principals after this.
attributes.name: Golden-haired Woman

attributes.content: By the way, I recall you mentioning that you brought a young lady to see me.
attributes.name: Golden-haired Woman

attributes.content: Ja, Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: This is Viviana, Werner's daughter.
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: Pleased to make your acquaintance, Ewigegnade—Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Ah, even better than expected. Are you still getting used to Leithanien after your return from Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: I am grateful for your concern. Leithanien is... far more elegant and beautiful than I remember.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: No need to be so formal. Cora and I often meet outside the Spires for a chat, like the one we're having now.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: You must still be in mourning over Werner's recent passing. If we had the luxury of time, I'd much rather you have a chance to relax in the city first.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: You mean, before you appoint me as—
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: An Empresses' Voice.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: As you've heard from Cora, this was Werner's request.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: I am... truly honored by the opportunity.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: The nobles prefer to send me their youngest sons when they're about ten years of age, but I believe you're fully qualified for the position.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: And after meeting you in person, I'm even more sure of it.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: You praise me too highly.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Modesty is a virtue, but so is the courage to speak your mind.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: While I'd be more than glad to fulfill your father's request, I'd also like to hear your own thoughts on this.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: How do you truly feel about yourself, about Leithanien, and about the future before us?
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: Your Majesty, I was not aware that you would be entertaining a guest.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: It's fine, Brandt. This is the time I told you to come over, after all. Tell me about your findings in Sturmland.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: Their copy of the Güldenesgesatz was stolen from the Kurfürst's spire.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: The thieves are most likely part of the same group behind the Kurfürst's assassination, who call themselves the 'Echoes of Herkunftshorn.'
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Herkunftshorn... The Genesis Horn. Now that's a name I haven't heard in a long time.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: ...The Witch King's remains.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: I interrogated one of their men. They have sent the copy to Zwillingstürme.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: To this very city...
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: Cora, how many years have we done Das Kaiserinnensfest?
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: This year will be the twenty-third, Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: So he's been dead for twenty-three years now.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: How many of these people working tirelessly in his name have even seen him with their own eyes?
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: It's something I've always found saddening. Just what is it about the Leithanien of today that fills them with so much resentment?
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: Resentment has never been rational, Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: Perhaps I should call off this year's event.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: If they really intend on using the Movement to cause chaos in the capital... I don't want anyone who came for the celebration to come to any harm.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: We still have three days to go.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: I will find them and retrieve it.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: I should have dispatched several Voices to work on this together.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: ...Allow me, Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: The Empresses' Voice represents the glory and majesty of the Kaiserinnen, so if they were to suddenly show up across the city, they will naturally attract the attention of both civilians and the enemy.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: But I... Or rather, what the people know me for has nothing whatsoever to do with this matter.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: An interesting proposal.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: Your Majesty, I believe we shouldn't let an untrained—
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Brandt Reiner. I'm sure you and Viviana will be enough to solve this problem for me.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: Also... Another Voice has just brought back a couple of interesting pieces from Kreis Wasserland. Ask Hildegard if she would like to come by my tower for a listening session.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: After all, you're going to go see her after this, yes?
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: ...Ja, Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Grandmaster Ioleta has taught you well. I have a feeling you'll be my favorite Voice.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: Danke schön.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Anyway, I don't need an answer today, but I'll allow you to act as an Empresses' Voice in the meantime. Of course, any new Voices will only officially enter the Spires after the celebrations are over, as per usual.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: Until then, I'll be anticipating your answer.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: My true feelings...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Sadly, our meeting has been as brief as a sunset.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: Ah, hold on.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: It's time. Do you see it?
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: The... fountain in the plaza?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Beautiful, no?
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: It is not simply water splashing along to a melody. The flowing water is itself the medium playing it.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: I've heard that many of the buildings and streets in Zwillingstürme are themselves instruments.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Back in the day, I took a bit of time to figure out a way to keep them stable for decades. It seems that was time well spent.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: So you designed them personally?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Viviana, no matter what choice you make in the end...
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: I do hope you'll fall in love with this place, as I have.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: Until then, let Zwillingstürme's afterglow bring you some solace.
attributes.name: Ewigegnade

attributes.content: ...The afterglow.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: She had often imagined what kind of city Zwillingstürme would be like.
She had a good guess from the novels and poems she read as a child.
She understood what it really looked like from the news and foreign television programs.
But only now does she stand in the center of the capital for the first time, experiencing the city's lights and shadows, its sounds and scents.
Colors out of a classical painting.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: The timbre of accordions playing.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: And the fragrance of marigolds.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It's just like a living poem... Surprisingly, the evening in Zwillingstürme is exactly how I imagined it.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You didn't need to involve yourself in this.
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: Her Majesty never gave me a chance to excuse myself before they spoke about it. Which means I was already involved.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Besides, there are things I'm curious about too.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You want to uncover the truth behind your father's death.
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: Not just that.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I also wish to... find myself, within the darkness about to descend upon us.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Then, are you already prepared to step into the night?
attributes.name: Cora

attributes.content: Before I returned, I gave away my entire book collection to a friend of mine.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: She, too, had just returned to the homeland that once expelled her, and carried with her a certain conviction.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I'm sure you'll laugh at me for saying this, but back then, I imagined countless times how she must have felt at that moment.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: And now, I think I have the slightest inkling of that feeling.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You have concerns about Lieselotte's decision.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: The Empresses' Voices chosen by Ewigegnade have always been qualified, and I will not question her judgement in that regard.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Frau Viviana Droste is an excellent caster. I've seen recordings of her skilled manipulations of candleflames and shadows.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: But... her experience in handling actual crises may be lacking. After all, all of her experience in battle has occurred on artificial stages.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Brandt Reiner.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: Your allegiance no longer lies with the Hochberg family.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: ...No one is more aware of that than I, Your Majesty.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: Otherwise, I wouldn't have simply stood there with a blank stare that night, twenty-three years ago.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: I lost the right to choose long ago. The blade and Arts of a Gesatzswächter belong only to the Güldenesgesatz and to Leithanien.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: The Güldenesgesatz, and Leithanien.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: What if you could only choose one?
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: The Güldenesgesatz defines Leithanien. In over a thousand years, the two have never diverged.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: The Movement's melody was created by Leithanians, and it's hardly impossible to alter it.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: Herkunftshorn certainly did.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: Bearing but one part of the responsibility necessarily means abandoning the others.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: Think it through, Brandt. No one in this land can refuse to make a choice forever.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: I will... carefully consider your words.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: There is one more thing. Ewigegnade wanted me to ask if you were free to listen to a performance by the Empresses' Voices.
attributes.name: Gesatzswächter

attributes.content: I will be.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: Lieselotte will probably have fallen asleep by the time I head over, though.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: Michael.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: Your Majesty. First things first, I don't want to go to the spire next door for dinner on your behalf anymore. I'm sure you know she doesn't like me at all.
Enough of your jests.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: Continue keeping an eye on the happenings in the city.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: Do you need me to 'cooperate' with the Gesatzswächter and the... unofficial Empresses' Voice? Or the opposite?
I already told you.
attributes.name: Grimmacht

attributes.content: 'Continue,' right? Got it.
Did you see that just now?
attributes.name: Art Gallery Spectator

attributes.content: Frau Seemann, she... and those black paintings too.
attributes.name: Art Gallery Spectator

attributes.content: How horrid!
attributes.name: Art Gallery Spectator

attributes.content: Everyone's saying that it's a curse from His Majesty...
attributes.name: Art Gallery Spectator

attributes.content: Move, all of you. Don't crowd in here.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: The road ahead is closed, and the gallery will not be opened to the public today.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Send a reply to Graf Josef. The Gendarmerie will bear the costs of the gallery's damages.
Ja, Captain Loris.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Right, did you save the contact details of the fräulein who lost her necklace the other day? That girl's the editor-in-chief for the Kunst der Zwillingstürme.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Please ask her to leave some space in their next issue for a presentation on, well, Frau Seemann's 'posthumous work.'
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: A... presentation?
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Invite the critics to use their imaginations.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Frau Seemann was creating a new work with her blood, sweat and tears, and unfortunately ended up also giving her life to the canvas and succumbing to exhaustion—Her final piece is certainly deserving of some sort of praise.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: 'Unfortunately, this incomplete masterpiece will not be exhibited to the public, as per her final wishes.'
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I can only hope for the article to have no mention of His Majesty's name.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: So... what do you think is the actual reason for Frau Seemann's demise?

attributes.name: Gendarmerie
attributes.content: Who let you in...?

attributes.name: Gendarmerie
attributes.content: Wait, the C-Candle..!
Technically, the title issued by the Kazimierz Knights Association no longer belongs to me after retirement.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I don't care what the Kazimierzians think!
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: A few years back, when they were hiding you in the snow, I wrote a few letters of protest to the Nova Knightclub! And when I later found out about your retirement, I drowned myself in drink for a few days, behind the Captain's back.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: So that's why you were slacking off back then?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: But I'll overlook it, for the sake of our distinguished guest.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Guten Tag, Vizegraf Loris Bordin.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: A pleasure to meet you.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Pym, pass the order: this lovely lady is the gallery's sole visitor of the day. Tell the men to keep watch outside, and not to interfere with her movements.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: R-Right away, sir!
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: When Frau Löwenstein greeted me earlier, I had no idea Their Majesties had actually appointed another special envoy.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I hope you can keep this a secret.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Please rest assured.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Although... this is such a small accident, so why did it spring the Kaiserin's secret envoy into action?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: An accident? Is that the conclusion of the Gendarmerie's investigation?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: We did the forensics, and Frau Seemann did indeed die from exhaustion.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: According to her attendant, she went without food or rest for multiple days on end.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I can't help but admire her spirit. Such a dedicated artist is hard to come by, even in Leithanien.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: This work must have been extremely important to her then.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Frau Seeman has not presented a new work for more than two decades.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: She then suddenly decided to work on this painting, even notifying the gallery in advance that would personally unveil it today, on the first day of the exhibition.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I'm sure you know what happened next. When the audience arrived, they were greeted only by the artist collapsing in front of her painting.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: What about the painting itself?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Was it... completed?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: A difficult question to answer.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: You'd better see it with your own eyes. I can only say that its subject was... an unexpected surprise.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Is this a brochure for the exhibition?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Der Tod des Hexenkönigs—Did the artist title her work before completing it?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: To be honest, many of the visitors came rushing here just because of the name.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I'd have thought Leithanien would find it quite unwelcome.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I'm guessing you haven't been here for long?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Mhm. I only just returned a little while ago.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: No wonder. You may not be aware, but the fall of His Majesty is an enormously popular subject these days. Even counting operas alone, there are over a hundred depicting how the Kaiserinnen miraculously triumphed over their enemy.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: How careless of me. So the actual protagonists of these stories are Their Majesties.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Haha. In Leithanien, you're free to create anything, so... this is probably the result of the people revealing their true feelings.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Frau Seemann may have also wanted to take the celebration as a chance to add a bit of luster to this national holiday, by working with such a classic theme.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: But even so, you said her painting was an 'unexpected surprise'?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It's up ahead, just around the corner.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Once you've had a look, I think you'll share my hope that this was just an accident.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: An attack?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Please wait here while I check the situation.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: I could help you out.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It might turn out to be just a couple of drunkards on the streets breaking in their new wands, and I'd rather not bother you with something so trifling.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Captain! We triangulated the source of the noise, and it's coming from the alley over there—
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Have you sent anyone over?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: The 2nd squad went in, but no one's come out yet.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: ...Are they still in there?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: It was the strangest fellow we've ever seen. He definitely heard us rushing over, but it seemed like he was still trying to break into the gallery instead of fleeing.
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: Could this be something big? Do you want to bring a few more men along, Captain?
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: No need for that.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Like I said, it's nothing major. Just some crazy punks stirring up trouble for us to vent their frustrations.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Right, that lady you fancy... the competition knight, what was her surname?
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Can...Candle... Droste!
attributes.name: Gendarmerie

attributes.content: ...A name I've never heard of.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Tell the others to keep the chase while we return to the gallery to make sure Frau Droste hasn't come to any harm.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: A noblewoman with the Kaiserin's trust is far more valuable than all the works and secrets in that gallery combined.
attributes.name: Loris

attributes.content: Footsteps?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Is there someone up ahead? Isn't the gallery closed off to the public?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: So this is the painting.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: And the subject is... the Death of the Witch King?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: No, this isn't Der Tod des Hexenkönigs at all...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: This is... ugh...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Black and disorderly, the lines twist into infinity.
Der Tod des Hexenkönigs sitting at the center isn't the only thing to have those twisted lines painted over it—every other painting on the wall sports the same look.
The black spirals resemble vortices, breaking out of the frames one after another and filling the entire space.
The lines seem to twist and burrow into her eyes, erupting into a series of mournful sobs in the depths of her mind.
Her consciousness is pulled, deformed, fractured, and plunged into chaos.
Shadows sway behind Viviana. She can hardly control her Arts. She wants to preserve herself, to escape.
This terrifying power needs no concrete descriptor, image, or sound to remind anyone of what it is.
Much like its title, it forcefully crams itself directly into its audience's cognition, reflecting its very meaning into their minds—
'The Witch King.'
What a beautiful piece of art.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: A calm voice can suddenly be heard in the center of the exhibition hall.
The noise comes to a halt, and the black spirals retreat into the paintings.
This painting...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: There's no obvious trace of Originium Arts... so why?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Arts aren't the only thing that can affect the mind.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Something need only be true enough to tug at one's heartstrings, be it a picture or a melody.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But please, don't fear it... feel it.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: ...It's very intense.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: A rich and deep emotion flows in these seemingly messy brushstrokes.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It's... hard to keep looking.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: That's because you're looking at a person's soul.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: She put both the Witch King in her heart and her very life onto the canvas.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Frau Seemann... What connection did she have with His Majesty?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: His death changed her entire life.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: As a young woman, she revered the man on the throne. She was in love with a symbol, a god.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: And then that god fell right before her eyes.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: She was confused, bewildered by his mortality. She lost her love, her purest emotions, and very nearly her ability to create as well.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: She was... trapped.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: And only when her life was nearing its end did she realize this.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You speak as if you were her.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Her innermost emotions resonated with my melody. I went into the depths of her soul and heard her cry for help.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Cry for help?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It's the same everywhere you go.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Many people are trapped in whatever fateful moment changed the course of their lives, walking along an endless spiral staircase.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Just like...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: ...Your father. And you as well.
attributes.name: Arturia
